function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Impact of COVID-19 crisis","Impact":"Potential harder times ahead aggravated by climate change, ecosystem degradation, and biodiversity loss","Mitigation":"Proactive adaptation towards a greener, more sustainable, and equitable society","Technologies":"Advanced monitoring and data analysis for early detection of disease outbreaks","People":"Individuals, communities, and societies","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, and communities"}]}
